english_instructions: Clean pig stomach. Use coarse salt. (Some people use lime, lemon, starch). https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rH534FOaF4I https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KAnWCSXREQM
Cook pig stomach in boiling water for five minutes to get rid of bad smell and taste. Discard water. Rinse pig stomach. Slice.
Cook ribs in boiling water for two minutes to get rid of bad smell and taste. Discard water. Rinse ribs.
Fry ginger slices and crushed white pepper for 30 seconds.
Pour in water, pig stomach, ribs, red dates. Bring to boil with high heat, then switch to medium heat and cook for 45 to 60 minutes. Add salt to your taste
Ribs and pig stomach can be served with soya sauce or oyster sauce.
chinese_instructions: 把豬肚放進熱水內煲5分鐘，除去異味。倒去水分，豬肚再用清水沖>洗。
把排骨放進熱水內煲2分鐘，除去異味。倒去水分，排骨再用清水沖 >洗。
用細火爆香薑片和白胡椒碎約30秒
加入水，豬肚，排骨，紅棗。大火煲滾，轉中火煲45至60分鐘。加鹽調味即成。
Ribs and pig stomach can be served with soya sauce or oyster sauce.
